1096640.name: Vital Signs: Emergency Department
1096640.description:
Play an ER doctor in Vital Signs: Emergency Department and challenge your medical knowledge to help treat a wide array of cases who come into the ER. Unlike medical school anyone can enroll in Vital Signs!

Reach a diagnosis by selecting from a wide range of tests and prescribe treatments to give your patients the best possible care. However, your decisions and how you handle the influx of cases who arrive during your shift will decide who gets the care they need and who misses out!

You completed the scenarios offered in the main game and have seen all nine patients. Naturally, you reached the best ideal care vs. improper care scores that are possible in Vital Signs: Emergency Department – so what now?

A day in the life of an ER doctor is almost never complete, and if you think you are capable of doing more, check out our nine additional content packs available for download on Steam. These content packs give you access to more scenarios and more patients so you can get back into the ER and save lives. What are you waiting for, doctor?

KEY FEATURES

  • Two scenarios

  • 9 patient cases

  • Add more patient cases and scenarios with downloadable content

  • Adjustable game speed to match your comfort level

  • Scoring based on ideal care vs. improper care
1096640.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
